resources:
RPP Demo
Welcome to RPP Demo App> A demonstration application providing RPP information to the client.
Contents include brief information of blood pressure (BP) and heart rate (HR), followed by the significance of rate pressure product (RPP). Based on the values of RPP, the app provides personalized suggestions for optimal workout routine The app is consisted of three parts: introduction, rpp measurement, and exercise suggestion Created by Jieun Ashley Lee of New Device Lab Continue
This is a content divider This is a heart icon This is a pulse icon This is a exerise icon View Exercise Suggestions Measure RPP Heart Rate: COMPUTED HEART RATE RPP: COMPUTED RPP
Personalized Exercise Suggestion Average HR: COMPUTED HEART RATE Average RPP: COMPUTED RPP Exercise Intensity: EXERCISE SUMMARY SHOW PERSONALIZED WOURKOUT ROUTINE PREVIOUS
